meanings.definition: A fuel gas mixture consisting primarily of hydrogen and carbon monoxide.
meanings.sent1: The factory used syngas to power its machinery efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The syngas was used as a clean fuel source in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The syngas was so eager to be burned that it jumped into the furnace itself!
meanings.sent4: The syngas whispered promises of energy as it flowed through the pipes.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue flame of the syngas lit up the room with its power.

meanings.definition: A synthetic gas produced by the gasification of organic materials.
meanings.sent1: The scientist created syngas in the lab for his research.
meanings.sent2: The syngas production plant converted wood chips into useful fuel.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous syngas played pranks on the other gases in the container.
meanings.sent4: The syngas danced in the air, a product of nature's alchemy.
meanings.sent5: The sweet smell of syngas filled the room, a reminder of its organic origins.
